description_html:
The Powerful C-Table combines old and new materials and technologies for the ultimate in functionality. With its polished stainless steel base, this table gives the illusion of a floating marble top while discreetly concealing multiple power options. The top can rotate up to 360 degrees, allowing for a variable layout and exposing plug access for extra functionality. It measures 20" long, 20" wide and 23" high. Custom materials and finishes available.

Integration has been taken to a whole new level and elegance with detailed incorporation of all that is needed for complex, yet simple to use power.  

"Working with one of the highest quality manufacturers and suppliers of power devices, we developed a line of powerful tables with thin-profile USB and outlets and achieved metal and colored faceplates matching the product," said acclaimed interior architect Lauren Rottet.

The piece is designed to change out the power if it goes obsolete and is durable enough to last for years -- the ultimate sustainable approach.
